description:
Christmas time is over and the town is now abuzz with the New Year`s spirit. Chloe and Yuria are ecstatic to see Japanese New Year`s in action. Kokomi obliges, and invites them into her humble abode. Fumio and Akane also join the gang, while Chloe and Yuria go into antics over Japanese customs, and through Isuzu`s generosity, they all enjoy an outing to the shrine for the countdown.
Source: crunchyroll
